answers.answer: check out hyperthyroidism or diabetes....poor kitty is in serious trouble. keep us updated please.♥
you can also check out...anemia, there are so many conditions that can give similar symptomshttp://www.petmd.com/cat/conditions/cardiovascular/c_ct_anemia_nonregenerative
I agree.  This is very very serious and possibly life threatening.Please get your cat to the vet ASAP.  Your cat's life depends on this!Hoping for the best!

Like Zodiacqueen stated, get your cat to the vet ASAP. I had this happen to a small dog of mine and we nearly lost him. The pale gums are the biggest clue according to my vet. This is serious. His life may be in danger.God Bless you and your furry child! ;-)
